data.title: Publisher Profile / New World Library
data.meta_description: Facts / Mission and genres: Founded over thirty-five years ago, “New World Library publishes books and audios that inspire and challenge us to improve the quality of our lives and our world. The ultimate goal of the company is a sweeping one...
data.text:
Facts

Mission and genres: Founded over thirty-five years ago, “New World Library publishes books and audios that inspire and challenge us to improve the quality of our lives and our world. The ultimate goal of the company is a sweeping one: personal and planetary transformation—awakening both individual consciousness and global social potential by publishing inspirational and practical materials in spirituality, personal growth, and other related areas.” Though the publisher is categorized as “New Age” they disagree with that label, as “there’s really nothing new in New Age.”

Founder and Publisher: Marc Allen
